data.title: Never Found anything
data.text: I have never found anything decent here to buy and prices are not competitive especially with the Trader Joes next door.

data.title: Yummy Fruit
data.text: This is one of my favorite places to go to for cherries and dried fruit.  Cherries are huge and yummy.

data.title: This is just a store.
data.text: After reading other peoples' reviews, I thought this would be worth a special trip.  I was disappointed.  They do sell nice fruit and food items, which might make nice gifts, but it really did not seem like anything special.  Neither their cherries nor their apricots were local (though the dried apricots were, I think). I guess if you go at the right time of year you can get local fruit. Trader Joe's is in the same parking lot, and could probably provide similar items.

data.title: A must visit in Sunnyvale
data.text: A wide selection of dried and fresh fruits at reasonable prices. The apricots are available in a variety of styles and come in handy boxes perfect for shipping.  We love to treat our out of town guests to a visit and explain part of the history of the area.  Don't forget to get some chocolate dipped apricots while you are there.

data.title: Juicy Cherries
data.text: This is a small fruit and nut market that has excellent cherries. The whole corner was once dominated by cherry trees and I am glad they retained a section to continue to sell their fruit.

data.title: One of the last original places in Sunnyvale.
data.text: This store was an old fruit stand when I was growing up here.  It is still family owned and run.  They have the most incredible cherries and apricots that are still grown in Sunnyvale.  If you have never had an apricot fresh from here, put it on your list of things to try.  These are not like the tasteless apricots that one finds in the supermarket.  These are juicy and sweet and are only available for a month from about mid June until mid July-don't miss it next year.  The grand daughter or the original C.J. Olson runs the expanded version of the original cherry stand.  She has jams, pies, chocolates, nuts and she will pack up all of this and ship it to your friends and family.  Lots of good things to try as well as a piece of Sunnyvale history.

data.title: Legendary Place for Cherries and Other Fruit - CJ Olson Cherries
data.text:
We like to go to CJ Olson Cherries.  Its been in the area ofr oer a century.  At the beginning this was prime agricultural land.  With the rise of Silicon Valley, its more a store now. 

They are known for having some of the bes Bingt cherries and Blenheim apricots and other fruit and products for sale.  They are very good.

The place is on El Camino, which is a a major road in Silicon Valley.
